search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Reflect (reflect.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Reflect can be found at: [https://reflect.app/#pricing](https://reflect.app/#pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
[Take notes using AI](https://reflect.app/#ai)Never miss a note, idea or connection.

![Image 1: hero video preview](https://reflect.app/home/build/q-cb311d1c.png)

Built for speed

Instantly sync your notes across devices

Networked notes

Form a graph of ideas with backlinked notes

iOS app

Capture ideas on the go, online or offline

End-to-end encryption

Only you can access your notes

Calendar integration

Keep track of meetings and agendas

Publishing

Share anything you write with one click

Instant capture

Save snippets from your browser and Kindle

Frictionless search

Easily recall and index past notes and ideas

![Image 2](https://reflect.app/)

How to use AI to take better notes

What can LLMs like GPT do, specifically for note-taking?

Answer the question I’m asking

Transcribe voice notes

with human-level accuracy

Generate article outlines

from your scattered thoughts

List key takeaways and action

items from your meeting notes

Chat with your notes

to find and organize information

Save your own

custom prompts

![Image 3](https://reflect.app/)

![Image 4](https://reflect.app/)

Your thoughts connected.

Backlink your notes to make everything easily searchable.

![Image 5](https://reflect.app/)

![Image 6](https://reflect.app/)

Frictionless thought capture.

Record your ideas and to-do’s easily, so you never miss a thing.

![Image 7](https://reflect.app/)

![Image 8](https://reflect.app/)

Integrated with your devices

We're everywhere, mobile or desktop, online  
or offline. Everything is synced in real-time.

Secure but open

End-to-end encryption keeps your notes secure.  
Our export and API keeps your notes accessible.

![Image 66: heart](https://reflect.app/)

![Image 67: Avatar of Sean Rose](https://reflect.app/)

Sean Rose

@

seanrose

Really, really liking [@reflectnotes](https://reflect.app/) so far. It's just the right amount of simple/fast for a personal note taking app and does most of the hard work of organizing in the background.

![Image 68: Avatar of Demetria Giles](https://reflect.app/)

Demetria Giles

@

drosewritings

Playing around with [@reflectnotes](https://reflect.app/). I’m back logging key thoughts, details and soundbites from episodes, books, meetings, articles, etc from the past week. So far, it’s a knowledge worker’s dream come true.

![Image 69: Avatar of Flour storm](https://reflect.app/)

Flour storm

@

adnan\_wahab\_

[@maccaw](https://twitter.com/maccaw) holy shit reflect app design is so good my writing and introspective ability went up 10x since i got it. was using bear/notion before but the simplicity of reflect is beautiful.

![Image 70: Avatar of Sean Rose](https://reflect.app/)

Sean Rose

seanrose

Really, really liking [@reflectnotes](https://reflect.app/) so far. It's just the right amount of simple/fast for a personal note taking app and does most of the hard work of organizing in the background.

![Image 72: Avatar of Flour storm](https://reflect.app/)

Flour storm

@

adnan\_wahab\_

[@maccaw](https://twitter.com/maccaw) holy shit reflect app design is so good my writing and introspective ability went up 10x since i got it. was using bear/notion before but the simplicity of reflect is beautiful.

![Image 73: Avatar of Jeremy McPeak](https://reflect.app/)

Jeremy McPeak

@

jwmcpeak

I just received an invite to [@reflectnotes](https://reflect.app/), and holy crap! It is well thought out, and I can see this being my note-taking platform going forward. Well done! I'm looking forward to seeing how the app progresses.

![Image 74: Avatar of Fabrizio Rinaldi](https://reflect.app/)

Fabrizio Rinaldi

@

linuz90

I’m keeping [@reflectnotes](https://reflect.app/) open \*all\* the time, and I’m using both for simple journaling, and long form writing. It’s rare to see a single app work so well for both.

![Image 75: Avatar of Jonathan Simcoe](https://reflect.app/)

Jonathan Simcoe

@

jdsimcoe

All righty. I have to give a massive shout-out to [@maccaw](https://twitter.com/maccaw) for pioneering [@reflectnotes](https://reflect.app/). It has already matured to a point where it is a daily driver for me. The speed, focus, and attention to detail (especially perfect bits of structured data) is superb.

![Image 76: Avatar of Chris](https://reflect.app/)

Chris

@

Mr\_Chris\_L

Absolutely loving [@reflectnotes](https://reflect.app/). The visualisation of the neural network is superb and seeing it develop makes me want to take daily notes. The back-linking makes associations effortless. Hats off to [@maccaw](https://twitter.com/maccaw) and his team, it’s exactly what I’ve been looking for🙏

![Image 77: Avatar of Jeremy McPeak](https://reflect.app/)

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is based on an annual subscription model with a monthly equivalent rate.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Includes all features for individual users.
